#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
# define m 1000000007
long long power(long long a,long long b)
{
	if(b==0)
	return 1;
	if(b==1)
	return a%m;
	long long t;
	t=(power(a,b/2));
	if(b%2==0)
	return ((t%m)*(t%m))%m;
	else
	return ((a%m)*(t%m)*(t%m))%m;	
}
int main()
{
	int t;
	long long n;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		long long res=power(10,n+1);
		res=(res-10-9*n)%m;
		res=(res*7)%m;
		double res2=(double)(res/81.0);
		printf("%.0lf\n",round(res2));
	}
	return 0;
}
